name: Madhur Kukreti
body:
My name is Madhur and I am currently working at [TripAdvisor](https://www.tripadvisor.com) as a Software Engineer. Prior to this, I worked at [BlackBerry](http://ca.blackberry.com/home.html) as a Software Engineering Co-op. I graduated from [University of Waterloo](https://uwaterloo.ca/) in 2015 with MMath in Computer Science. 

Feel free to stick around and browse some of my projects or send me an email at kukreti [dot] madhur [at] gmail [dot] com.

[My research publications](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=RjZbJgMAAAAJ&hl=en)

[ClipExpert - An app I created during BlackBerry Hackathon](https://appworld.blackberry.com/webstore/content/59957228/?countrycode=CA&lang=en)

[My page from back from university which I keep neglecting](https://cs.uwaterloo.ca/~mkukreti/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
